item.description:
Lead a Healthier Life –Register Now

Life Force Energy

The Hippocrates Approach to Optimum Health

10 Week Health Educator Certification Program or sign up for individual classes

  

Wednesdays 6:00 - 9:30 PM, Sept. 7th to Nov. 16th

 Thursdays 10:00AM - 2:00PM, Sept. 8th to Nov. 17th

 

Be revitalized and re-energized by eating nourishing, vibrant, life-giving, healing and enjoyable foods that will build your immune system to its highest level.  

  • Learn by Hands-On Experience to Prepare New Recipes - Each week the class learns to prepare and enjoys eating great healthy living foods 
  • Take home Hippocrates DVD's and workbook to learn at your leisure and then get your questions answered in class.
  • Talk with weekly guest speakers - Hippocrates graduates -recovered from diabetes, cancer, chronic fatigue, peptic ulcers, lyme disease, depression, irritable bowel syndrome and other dis-eases.
  • Achieve your ideal weight easily and naturally.
  • Discover how easy and quick it is to prepare healthy food that adults and kids love to eat.
  • Free Weekly Coaching outside of class by a previously graduated Health Educator

Prepaid $395 by Aug. 31 or $450 or $55 per individual class (If space is available) ($300 is tax-deductible. Cost of 3rd edition of 400 page manual and food is $150.00.) 

 

If paying for an individual class must give 4 days notice 

 

Only $250 more for a Family Member.  You’ll receive the manual, DVD loaners to watch at home, hands-on food prep, guest speakers,  delicious samples and your personal coach.  For syllabus see www.OptimumHealthSolution.org Working scholarships are available.

 

A Typical Class Format

 

 

5 minutes – Centering

60 minutes – Hands-on Food Preparation

90 minute – Guest Speaker with Q & A

Remaining time - Discussion

 

Prep for Week 1 

Read Week 1 in the manual and watch DVDs: Principles of Health, Eating

 

Week One Sept. 7 & 8 – Life Force Energy and Hippocrates Principles of Optimum Health & how to get started - Wheatgrass Juice, Hippocrates Green Drink & Eggless Egg Salad Rollups

 

Homework: Read Week 2 in the manual and watch DVDs: Sprouting, Water

 

Week Two Sept. 14 & 15 – Indoor Sprouting for Fun and Nutrition – Sprouting with Guest Speaker: Randy Jacobs Founder and Director of Life Force Growers who will teach you the how and why of sprouting. Learn to prepare healthy, delicious breakfasts – Hippocrates Green Drink, Chia porridge with almond milk, smoothies.

 

Homework: Read Week Three in the manual and watch DVDs: Fasting, Internal Awareness

 

Week Three Sept. 28-29 – Fasting and Internal Awareness; Preparing Nori Rolls For this topic it is very important to attend the September 24th Seminar by Dr. Tel-Oren on Digestive Secrets. Guest Speaker: Marlene Campbell on Quantum-Touch, The Power to Heal - Campbell, a Certified Practitioner & Instructor of Quantum Touch, will introduce and demonstrate Quantum-Touch. QT is based on the principles of resonance and entrainment. In a Quantum Touch Workshop, Marlene teaches how to focus, amplify, and direct this energy, for a wide range of benefits with surprising and often extraordinary results. When the practitioner creates a field of high frequency life-force energy, another can entrain to this higher frequency, amplifying the body's ability to heal itself with innate intelligence. Marlene has been a practitioner and an instructor of energy healing since 2000; it was then that she left her public school teaching career to help people empower themselves. When one becomes aware of the power of their thoughts, words and emotions, great changes can occur. 

All will receive Quantum-Touch energy healing.

 

Homework: Read Week 4 in the manual and watch DVDs: Detox, Making A Killing

 

Week Four Oct. 5-6 – Cleanse and Purify Yourself & Making Nori Rolls - Guest Speaker: Tom Lindsley, who has studied nutrition since 1985. During that time he has had the opportunity to personally study with Dr. Young of the PH miracle to whom he will always be indebted. Tom has studied at The Tree of Life, Whitaker Wellness institute, and Hippocrates and has gained valuable insight on nutrition from coordinating the top speakers and authors in the nutrition field for the New England Raw speaker series since 2006.

 

Tom became raw in 1999 and teaches life-affirming healing practices, cleansing, and moderation. With so much of our emotional life tied to what we eat, Tom teaches an emotional releasing journey of the spirit while helping people evolve to new levels of joyful healthy living. He received a Masters degree in Hypnosis and Neuro-Linguistic programming, as well as an executive coaching degree from Tony Robbins. From competitive snowboarding to 25 years of corporate excellence in creating financial freedom in real estate, Tom can coach from experience on a variety of levels. He personally has undertaken dozens of cleanses of different modalities around the world.

 

Homework: Read Weeks 5 and 6 in the manual and watch DVDs: Food Combining, Meatrix, Delicate Balance

 

 

Week Five Oct. 12 & 13 - Food Combining, Salads and Salad Dressing -Guest Speaker: Stephanie Whiting, Life Force Energy Health Educator; Hippocrates Health Institute Life Change 3 week program; Hallelujah Acres 7 day program and Health Minister Training; Physical Education Health Teacher; former migraine headaches sufferer for 13 years before going raw; mother and wife.

 

Homework: Watch DVDs: Healing Cancer, Simply Raw

 

 

Week Six  Oct 19 & 20 - Pasta Marinara Food Preparation followed by lecture: Complementary Medicine to Enhance the Living Food Lifestyle, Guest Speaker: Joe Lucier LMT NANP: Optimum Health through the Living Foods lifestyle, can be greatly supported with complementary medicine. Joe Lucier, founder of the Raw New England Community, Raw Vegan over 10 years, trained at the following locations:

  • • Tree of Life    Rejuvenation Center AZ Gabriel Cousens
  • • Living Light   Culinary Arts Institute Chef & Nutrition CA Cheri Soria
  • • Brenda Cobb Living Foods Institute GA
  • • Alissa Cohen            Chef Training CA ME

 

He is also a long time medical massage therapist and Tong Ren practitioner and will explain how his healing techniques support healing and above all, enhance the different systems of the body to maximize healthy functioning. Everyone will get a Tong Ren distance healing treatment.

 

Homework: Read Week Seven in the manual and watch DVDs: Supplements, Supplement 2009 Lecture

 

Field Trip to Whole Foods led by Lauren Klatsky, Whole Foods Marketing Team Leader at the Whole Foods Market in Dedham. She is a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America and holds a certificate from the Kripalu School of Ayurveda. Lauren also has experience teaching adult education cooking classes as well as writing about food and healthy lifestyle choices. Oct. 6  3 pm for Thurs. class & 6 pm for Wed. class.

 

Week Seven Supplements and Enzymes Oct. 26 & 27  – Flax Crackers, Kale Chips & Other Dehydrates, Guest Speaker Carla Finn, Life Force Energy Health Educator; BA in Music Recording Engineering & Production, diagnosed with gerd and low stomach acids, chronic fatigue, adrenal fatigue, low mineral absorption and hyper thyroid – and after a year of practicing the Living Food lifestyle she feels 90% better. She will share her story and the importance of supplements and answer questions.

 

Homework: Read Week 8 in the manual and watch DVDs: Practical Living, Overcoming the Food Imprint

 

 

 

Week Eight Nov. 2 & 3 -- Practical Living Fermentation Guest Speaker: Annie Margeson – Life Force Energy Health Educator;  Hatha yoga teacher for Adult and Children; avid gardener, single mother of 3.

 

Homework: Read Week 9 in the manual and watch DVDs: Food Inc., Processed People

 

Week 9 Bringing It All Home Nov. 9 & 10 – Lemon Cheesecake and Other Desserts Guest Speaker for Thursday: Kate Kilmurray a graduate of The Life Force Energy Health program has also studied at The Hippocrates Institute, Tree of Life, Kushi Institute and The Strengthening Health Institute. These educational programs along with her yoga and meditation practice have helped her heal chronic asthma, neck pain and fatigue. Kate mentors others on mindful living ( www.katekilmurray.com ) . Wed TBA

 

Homework: Watch DVDs Food Matters, Living Matrix

 

Week 10 Nov. 16 & 17 - Graduation Awards and What’s Next? Plus - a Banquet!


Register or to Ask  Questions call Betsy Bragg at 617-835-2913 or email bbski@stanfordalumni.org
